entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:16 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 4 cm in snow squalls. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
